function_declarations.name: resource-list
function_declarations.description: List all resources of a specific type from the ROM (rooms, sprites, dungeons, entrances, items, overlords)

function_declarations.name: resource-search
function_declarations.description: Search for resources by name or pattern

query.description: Search query or pattern to match

function_declarations.name: dungeon-list-sprites
function_declarations.description: List all sprites in a specific dungeon or room

dungeon.description: Dungeon name (e.g., 'hyrule_castle', 'eastern_palace') or leave empty for all

function_declarations.name: dungeon-describe-room
function_declarations.description: Get detailed information about a specific dungeon room including sprites, chests, layout, and connections

function_declarations.name: overworld-find-tile
function_declarations.description: Find all locations where a specific tile16 ID appears in the overworld

tile_id.description: Tile16 ID to search for (hex format like '0x42' or decimal)

map_id.description: Specific overworld map to search (0-63, optional)

function_declarations.name: overworld-describe-map
function_declarations.description: Get detailed information about a specific overworld map including tile composition, warps, and sprites

map_id.description: Overworld map ID (0-63 for light/dark world)

function_declarations.name: overworld-list-warps
function_declarations.description: List all warp/entrance points for a specific overworld map

function_declarations.name: overworld-list-sprites
function_declarations.description: List all sprites placed on a specific overworld map

function_declarations.name: overworld-get-entrance
function_declarations.description: Get detailed information about a specific entrance/exit including destination and properties

function_declarations.name: overworld-tile-stats
function_declarations.description: Get statistical analysis of tile usage across overworld maps

map_id.description: Specific map ID or 'all' for global statistics
